entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:06 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -36.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 02:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: -36.4°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -40.7°C
Wind: SE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 31.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 49 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
